org.openhab.core.autoupdate

Interface AutoUpdateBindingProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BindingProvider

    public interface AutoUpdateBindingProvider
extends BindingProvider
    This interface is implemented by classes that can provide configuration information of the AutoUpdate feature. Implementing classes should register themselves as a service in order to be taken into account.
    Author:
    Thomas Eichstaedt-Engelen - Initial contribution

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Boolean autoUpdate(String itemName)
      Indicates whether an Item with the given itemName is configured to automatically update it's State after receiving a Command or not.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.openhab.core.binding.BindingProvider

        addBindingChangeListener, getItemNames, providesBinding, providesBindingFor, removeBindingChangeListener

    • Method Detail

      • autoUpdate

        Boolean autoUpdate(String itemName)
        Indicates whether an Item with the given itemName is configured to automatically update it's State after receiving a Command or not.
        Parameters:
        itemName - the name of the Item for which to find the configuration
        Returns:
        false to disable the automatic update, true to enable the automatic update and null if there is no configuration for this item.
